title: U.S. arms exports 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars, of value 9086.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Export value in TIV in million constant (1990) U.S. dollars about 6800.0 was reached at Year 2008
